sense.def:
An event
je nekaj, kar se zgodi, zlasti nekaj nenavadnega ali pomembnega.

seg.quote: Next day the newspapers reported the event.
...the most important event in family life.

sense.def:
Vse, kar se dogaja ob neki priložnosti, lahko imenujemo
events
.

seg.quote: The authorities were quite unable to control events.

sense.def:
An event
v športu je ena od dejavnosti na organiziranem tekmovanju ali prireditvi.

seg.quote: Lord Exeter presented the medals for this event.
